author: FOX Sports
title: Russell Westbrook is supporting his hometown of Los Angeles during the COVID-19 pandemic
description: Houston Rockets superstar guard Russell Westbrook is an LA kid, and he is donating his resources to help his hometown during the coronavirus outbreak.
content: With the NBA, NHL, NASCAR and other major sports leagues and sporting events suspended or canceled, professional athletes are using their platforms to facilitate financial support for arena workers and those affected by COVID-19 across the nation. Each day, w… [+2225 chars]
